page.title: 07A NEIGHBOURHOOD, BRACKNELL.
page.content:
{Harmans Water neighbourhood}is an established one, many of it's residents having lived here for twenty years or more. Some may have come with their parents and grown up here, others were born here. {Employment } brought many people here from London and many other parts of the country.
The long term inhabitants have seen many changes in the area. Not the least of these is the development of the{Crown Wood}estate, with its much younger populace. This has come between Harmans Water and its woodland walks, as it was built on land which was coniferous forest. Harmans Water has a small but comprehensive{shopping precinct} including a library and hair stylist. The{houses}are a mix of private, council and ex-council.
